item.title: Bangalore to Kollur Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kollur can be a serene and spiritually enriching experience, as Kollur is home to the famous Mookambika Temple. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Bangalore to Kollur Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. The distance between Bangalore and Kollur is approximately 400 kilometers, and the drive takes around 8-9 hours.
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
